data.title: Car Rental Miami Airport (MIA)
data.meta_description: Experience exceptional service with SIXT car rental at Miami Airport (MIA) â¤ We offer premium vehicles at prices you can afford with the add-ons you want.
data.text:
At SIXT, we care about what you want. Whether you plan to visit the beaches, shop until you drop, play a round of golf, or head to the amusement parks, renting a SIXT car will make your Miami trip easier. When you land at Miami International Airport (MIA), simply look for our bright orange signage and weâll get you on the road in no time.

From convertibles to SUVs, our top-of-the-line luxury cars will take your trip to the next level. We also offer compact sedans, family-friendly minivans, and midsize options. BMWs, Toyotas, or Audis â we have whatever you need for your trip.

We give you the freedom to decide during every step of the SIXT rental process. Thatâs why we let you choose the add-ons that best suit your needs. Select the protection plan that makes you feel safest, include an additional driver, or modify your booking dates â we support you every step of the way.

We put effort into making sure you leave our SIXT location feeling confident, relaxed, and ready to start your trip. Here are a few things we do to make your trip better:

So Many Travel Tips: Whether youâre in Florida for a babymoon trip or embarking on a coastal road trip, our travel guides offer insider info and travel tips that will make your adventure more memorable.

All About Tolls: We offer toll transponders so you donât have to wait to pay in long lines.

GPS: A GPS navigation system can be added with all of our car bookings.

Stay Protected: We make choosing the right protection plan easy. From Personal Accident to Extended Roadside Protection, we tell you everything you need to know about protection plans when renting a car in Florida.

With over 100 years of experience, we don't just rent cars. We customize the rental process to meet your every need â you're in the driver's seat.
